add.description: This is the label for the 'Add' buttons.

block_element_description.message: Block specific element on this website

click_element_to_block_it.message: Click an element on the page to block it.

common_copyright.message: Copyright © $year$ All rights reserved. Adblock Plus® is a registered trademark of <a0>eyeo GmbH</a0>.

common_feature_anti_adblock_title.description: Feature title for anti-adblock blocking filter list

common_feature_malware_title.description: Feature title for anti-malware filter list

common_feature_privacy_title.description: Feature title for privacy filter list

common_feature_social_title.description: Feature title for social media blocking filter list

common_notification_hide.description: Hidden text attached to the close button for screen readers of Notification

day1_blockelement_description.message: Block them with Adblock Plus's nifty block element feature.

day1_blockelement_screenshot.message: Example of icon pop-up with "Block element" button highlighted.

day1_blockelement_title.message: Tired of comment sections bringing you down?

day1_community_description_1.message: As an open source project, we depend on users like you to help us improve your ad-blocking experience.

day1_community_description_2.message: What features would you like to see? What can we do better? Is Adblock Plus making some websites misbehave?

day1_header_title.message: Adblock Plus blocked $ads$ ads in the last half hour, some of which might have contained malicious content

description.description: https://gitlab.com/eyeo/adblockplus/webstores/blob/d7acfa77af92c53bce1aa5e243bd81768e004e01/spec/chrome-web-store/listing-en_US.md#summary, Note: this cannot be longer than 132 characters
description.message: Block YouTube™ ads, pop-ups & fight malware!

devtools_footer.message: <a0>Reload</a0> page to see effect of filter changes

devtools_header.description: https://gitlab.com/eyeo/specs/spec/blob/28aba213f76265253786a9ed64fdba1377644352/spec/abp/devtools-panel.md#header e.g. Show all items of any type; Show blocked items of IMAGE type

easy_create_filter.description: Action in popup UI to add a filter which blocks an element selected from the current page

filter_action_failed.description: One or more filters could not be saved or updated.
filter_action_failed.message: Something went wrong. Please try again.

filter_elemhideemulation_nodomain.message: No active domain specified for extended element hiding filter

filter_slow.description: A slow filter highlighted through the warning icon
filter_slow.message: To ensure a fast filter, please check the length of the pattern and ensure it doesn't contain a regular expression.

filter_snippet_nodomain.message: No active domain specified for snippet filter

firstRun_browser_description.message: From the team behind Adblock Plus, the most popular ad blocker for desktop browsers, Adblock Browser is now available for your Android and iOS devices.

firstRun_browser_store_ios.message: Available on the iTunes App Store

firstRun_control_description.message: By default, you may see some nonintrusive ads that adhere to <a0>strict criteria</a0>. We identify these ads as Acceptable Ads. Prefer to block all ads? <a1>Turn off Acceptable Ads</a1> in your <a2>Settings</a2>.

firstRun_fair_description.message: We encourage you to make fair use of Adblock Plus and the option to whitelist websites. Depending on the filters you use, you understand and accept that unintentional results might occur (e.g. blocked content on a website). Refer to the <a0>Terms of Use</a0> for more information about fair use of Adblock Plus.

firstRun_subtitle.message: You just took control of your browser.

firstRun_warning_dataCorrupted_intro.description: Text shown at beginning of warning being shown when data corruption was detected
firstRun_warning_dataCorrupted_intro.message: Some users are experiencing an issue where this page opens each time their browser is launched. This issue can be resolved by uninstalling and reinstalling Adblock Plus:

firstRun_warning_dataCorrupted_note.description: Footnote at the end of warning being shown when data corruption was detected
firstRun_warning_dataCorrupted_note.message: If you still need help, contact us at <a0>support@adblockplus.org</a0> or visit our <a1>Help Center</a1>.

firstRun_warning_dataCorrupted_step1.description: First step of instructions in warning being shown when data corruption was detected

firstRun_warning_dataCorrupted_step2.description: Second step of instructions in warning being shown when data corruption was detected
firstRun_warning_dataCorrupted_step2.message: Locate Adblock Plus and remove it.

firstRun_warning_dataCorrupted_step3.description: Third step of instructions in warning being shown when data corruption was detected

firstRun_warning_reinitialized.message: It seems that an issue caused all filters to be removed and we were unable to restore a backup. Therefore we had to reset your filters and Acceptable Ads settings. Please check your filter lists and Acceptable Ads settings in the Adblock Plus options.

issueReporter_anonymousSubmission_warnin.message: We won't be able to come back to you and will likely prioritize the report lower.

issueReporter_comment_description.message: Please help us better understand the issue by leaving a comment below.

issueReporter_config_label.message: Include information about my browser configuration, as well as a list of active extensions I'm using.

issueReporter_confirmationMessage.message: Your report has been saved. You can access it at the following address:

issueReporter_data_gathering_tab.message: Note: An additional tab will temporarily open so the page you are on won't be affected by the Issue Reporter.

issueReporter_email_description.message: It's helpful to enter a valid email address. This allows us to contact you to fix difficult issues like malware. Keep in mind that it's not mandatory to enter an email address, and your address will never be shared.

issueReporter_errorMessage.message: An attempt to send the report failed with error code "?1?". Please ensure you are connected to the Internet and retry. If the problem persists please request assistance in the [link]Adblock Plus forum[/link].

issueReporter_falseNegative_description.message: Adblock Plus is enabled, but I still see an ad or ads.

issueReporter_falsePositive_description.message: The page displays incorrectly, fails to function or seems to be missing important content.

issueReporter_falsePositive_label.message: The page I'm trying to view is broken

issueReporter_highlighter_description.message: Use the tools to highlight each ad or hide sensitive info on the screenshot. Highlighting ads will help us fix the issue faster.

issueReporter_knownIssueMessage.message: The issue you reported is probably already known. More information:

issueReporter_other_issues.message: For all other issues, please contact us via <a0>support@adblockplus.org</a0>.

issueReporter_screenreader_warning.message: To help us better understand the issue, a screenshot is required when submitting an issue report. Depending on the website you're currently on, the screenshot might contain personal information. If you're uncomfortable submitting a screenshot, please email your issue to <a0>support@adblockplus.org</a0>.

issueReporter_sending.message: Please wait while Adblock Plus is submitting your report.

issueReporter_showData_label.message: Click this link to review the report data before sending

issueReporter_typeSelector_heading.message: What type of issue are you experiencing?

line.description: Error message with line number indicator

name_devbuild.description: Extension name to be shown for development builds. Note: this cannot be longer than 45 characters.

name_releasebuild.description: Extension name to be shown for release builds. Note: this cannot be longer than 45 characters.

notification_day1_message.message: That's a lot of annoying ads. Find out what else Adblock Plus can block.

notification_open_all.message: Open all links from this notification

notification_problem_message.message: An issue has caused your ABP settings to be reset to default. Fix the issue and learn more

notification_updates_message.message: No action is required—continue browsing the web without annoying ads! See what's new

notification_without_buttons.message: Click on the notification to open all links in it.

options_aa_opt_out_survey.message: To help us improve Adblock Plus, mind sharing why you’ve turned off Acceptable Ads?

options_acceptableAds_ads_description_1.description: Acceptable Ads section 'Allow some nonintrusive ads' option description in General tab
options_acceptableAds_ads_description_1.message: Acceptable Ads are not annoying and do not interfere with the content you are viewing. Read more about the Acceptable Ads criteria

options_acceptableAds_ads_label.description: Acceptable Ads section option label in General tab

options_acceptableAds_description.description: Acceptable Ads section description in General tab
options_acceptableAds_description.message: Acceptable Ads are nonintrusive ads. They are the middle ground between ad blocking and supporting online content because they generate revenue for website owners.

options_acceptableAds_dnt_notification.description: Acceptable Ads section's notification (being shown if Do Not Track is not enabled) in General tab
options_acceptableAds_dnt_notification.message: Note: You have Do Not Track (DNT) disabled in your browser settings. For this feature to work properly, please enable DNT in your browser preferences. Find out how to enable DNT.

options_acceptableAds_privacy_label.description: Acceptable Ads section option label in General tab
options_acceptableAds_privacy_label.message: Only allow ads without third-party tracking

options_advanced_description.message: Customize Adblock Plus, add or remove filter lists, create and maintain your own filter lists

options_customFilter_cancel.description: Label below raw view of user's filter list in Advanced tab

options_customFilters_description.description: Custom filter lists section description in Advanced tab
options_customFilters_description.message: Create and maintain your own filters to further control what content Adblock Plus allows or blocks. <a0>Learn how to write filters (English only)</a0>

options_customFilters_widget_title.description: Custom filter widget title in Advanced tab

options_customize_blockElement.description: Option label of customize section in Advanced tab

options_customize_blockElement_tooltip.description: Tooltip text for Show 'Block element' option item of customize section in Advanced tab
options_customize_blockElement_tooltip.message: Temporarily block annoying items on a webpage, e.g. images or animated slideshows.

options_customize_elemhideDebug.message: Turn on debug element hiding filters mode

options_customize_elemhideDebug_tooltip.message: Highlight elements on a page that are affected by element hiding filters.

options_customize_iconStats.description: Option label of customize section in Advanced tab
options_customize_iconStats.message: Show number of ads blocked in icon

options_customize_showDevToolsPanel.description: Option label of customize section in Advanced tab
options_customize_showDevToolsPanel.message: Show 'Adblock Plus' panel in developer tools

options_customize_showDevToolsPanel_tool.description: Tooltip text for Show 'Adblock Plus' panel option item of customize section in Advanced tab
options_customize_showDevToolsPanel_tool.message: View blocked and whitelisted items from your browser's developer tools panel.

options_customize_showNotifications.description: Option label of customize section in Advanced tab

options_customize_showNotifications_tool.description: Tooltip text for Show notifications option item of customize section in Advanced tab
options_customize_showNotifications_tool.message: Allow notifications from Adblock Plus (notifications related to critical performance issues will always be shown).

options_filterList_description.description: Filter lists section description in Advanced tab
options_filterList_description.message: Each Adblock Plus setting functions because of a filter list. Below are the filter lists that correspond to all of your Adblock Plus settings. You can also add additional filters created and maintained by our trusted community.

options_filterList_empty.description: Empty text of filter list table in Advanced tab
options_filterList_empty.message: You have not added any filter lists to Adblock Plus. Filter lists you add will be shown here.

options_filterList_lastDownload_invalidU.message: Not a valid address. Check the URL.
Download failed. URL must start with $protocol$.

options_filterList_now.description: Text inside 'Last update' column in Advanced tab

options_filterList_source.description: Context menu item in advanced tab, appears after click on subscription

options_filterList_updateNow.description: Context menu item in advanced tab, appears after click on subscription

options_filterList_website.description: Context menu item in advanced tab, appears after click on subscription

options_general_description.message: Determine what Adblock Plus shows and hides on websites

options_generic_error.message: Uh oh! Something went wrong. Please try again.

options_help_center.message: Looking for answers to your questions? <a0>Visit our Help Center (English only)</a0>

options_help_description.message: Find help or get in touch with us

options_language_add.description: Add other language button in General Tab

options_language_change.description: Language section language list single entry text in General tab

options_language_description.description: Language section description in General tab
options_language_description.message: Optimize Adblock Plus for the language(s) you typically browse websites in.

options_language_empty.description: Language section language list empty text in General tab
options_language_empty.message: You don't have any language-specific filters.

options_language_join.description: Combines language filter list specifications(language names) together, ex: -> https://gitlab.com/eyeo/specs/spec/blob/5a876713adebe79842be51ad6e287b1c675e023a/spec/abp/desktop-settings.md#language-drop-down

options_language_tip.description: Language section tip in General tab
options_language_tip.message: TIP: Only select the languages you need. Selecting more will slow down the ad blocker and, therefore, your browsing speed.

options_more_filters_description.description: More filters section description in General tab
options_more_filters_description.message: These are additional filters you previously added to Adblock Plus.

options_more_filters_note.description: More filters section note in General tab
options_more_filters_note.message: Note: You should only use third party filter lists from authors that you trust.

options_recommended_cookies_tooltip.message: By adding this filter you are waiving your right to be notified about cookies and edit cookie settings on individual websites. Please note that some websites may track you by default. More info here: <a0>https://adblockplus.org/block-cookie-warnings</a0>

options_recommended_notifications_toolti.message: Stop websites from asking you to allow push notifications that could track your online activity.

options_recommended_privacy_tooltip.message: Protect your privacy from known entities that may track your online activity across websites you visit.

options_recommended_social_tooltip.message: The social media icons on the websites you visit allow social media networks to build a profile of you based on your browsing habits - even when you don't click on them. Hiding these icons can protect your profile.

options_refresh.description: refresh text in the main toggle

options_report_bug.description: 'Support' section list item in Help tab
options_report_bug.message: Found a bug? Send us a bug report

options_report_forum.description: 'Support' section list item in Help tab
options_report_forum.message: Want support from our community? Go to the Forum

options_short.description: Link to the options page from the popup balloon.

options_social_description.description: 'Get in touch' section description in Help tab
options_social_description.message: Have a question or a new idea? We're here to help.

options_supportUs_description.message: Please take a moment to rate ABP or donate to the project. Thanks for your support!

options_tab_advanced.description: Sidebar tab label and main heading inside corresponding tab

options_tab_whitelist.description: Sidebar tab label and main heading inside corresponding tab

options_tracking_warning_1.description: Text of the tracking notification (being shown when both 'Acceptable Ads' and 'EasyPrivacy' are enabled) in General tab
options_tracking_warning_1.message: We noticed you have both $tracking$ and $acceptableAds$ enabled.

options_tracking_warning_2.description: Text of the tracking notification (being shown when both 'Acceptable Ads' and 'EasyPrivacy' are enabled) in General tab
options_tracking_warning_2.message: We want you to know that in order for advertisers to show you more relevant ads, there may be some tracking with Acceptable Ads.

options_tracking_warning_3.description: Text of the tracking notification (being shown when both 'Acceptable Ads' and 'EasyPrivacy' are enabled) in General tab
options_tracking_warning_3.message: If you prefer extra privacy, select the $acceptableAdsPrivacy$ checkbox below.

acceptableAdsPrivacy.example: Only allow ads without third-party tracking

options_tracking_warning_acknowledgment.description: Text in the tracking notification (being shown when both 'Acceptable Ads' and 'EasyPrivacy' are enabled) in General tab

options_whitelist_description.message: You've turned off ad blocking on these websites and, therefore, will see ads on them.

options_whitelist_empty_1.message: You don't have any whitelisted websites.

options_whitelist_empty_2.message: Websites you trust and want to allow ads on will be shown here.

options_whitelist_notification.description: Notification that is shown after a new website is whitelisted

problem_note.message: Note that depending on how you use ABP, you may need to re-configure your settings, custom filters, and whitelisted websites once you reinstall Adblock Plus.

problem_social_description.message: Experiencing an issue? Contact our support team

problem_solution_action.message: Click here to uninstall and reinstall Adblock Plus

problem_solution_opera_step_1.message: Open this link to Opera Addons (it will open in a new tab)

problem_solution_opera_step_2.message: From the Opera toolbar, right-click / control-click the Adblock Plus icon and select Manage extension.

problem_solution_opera_step_3.message: Click the arrow next to the Adblock Plus icon.

problem_solution_opera_step_4.message: Locate Adblock Plus and click the X in the upper-right corner.

problem_subtitle.message: Because of this, your ABP settings have been reset to default. To resolve the issue, you'll need to uninstall and reinstall Adblock Plus. Click the link below to do this.

problem_subtitle_opera.message: Because of this, your ABP settings have been reset to default. To resolve the issue, you'll need to uninstall and reinstall Adblock Plus. Follow the steps below to do this.

problem_title.message: A browser issue has caused your ABP settings to be reset.

promote_abp_module.message: Interested in Adblock Plus on mobile?

refresh_to_take_effect.message: Click the button below for changes to take effect.

sendReport.message: Report an issue on this page

share_on_twitter_message.message: I've blocked $number$ ads with Adblock Plus. Give it a try - it's FREE!

share_on_weibo_message.message: I've blocked $number$ ads with Adblock Plus. Give it a try - it's FREE!

stats_header.description: Stats description above the page / total stats

unexpected_filter_list_header.description: Error message shown when the user attempts to add a custom filter that has the format of a header (e.g. "[Adblock Plus 2.0]") which are only allowed in filter lists
unexpected_filter_list_header.message: Filter list headers aren't allowed here

updates_contribute_donate_subtitle.message: Your support allows us to continue to improve Adblock Plus.

updates_contribute_rate_subtitle.message: Please take a moment and help spread the word by rating Adblock Plus. It's quick and free!

updates_contribute_subtitle.message: Consider supporting ABP in one of two ways:

updates_social_description.message: Share your thoughts on the latest ABP update.

updates_social_title.message: We want to hear from you!

updates_subtitle.message: We think you'll like the latest updates.

updates_update_i1_description.message: You will see a new section when you open your Settings called Recommended Filters. Here you can easily turn on/off recommended filters with a simple click and enhance your web experience.

updates_update_i1_image.message: "Block push notifications" and "Block cookie warnings" filter lists highlighted in "RECOMMENDED FILTERS" section of options page

updates_update_i1_title.message: Added new recommended filter lists for easy access

updates_update_i3_description.message: For our more advanced users, we have a new debug-element hiding filters mode that can be turned on in the advanced settings. Elements will then be highlighted for easy debugging.
